name: AbsorbPointer
desc: A widget that absorbs pointers during hit testing.

fields.name: absorbing
fields.desc: Whether this widget absorbs pointers during hit testing.

fields.name: ignoringSemantics
fields.desc: Whether the semantics of this render object is ignored when compiling the semantics tree.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of AbsorbPointer
desc: As shown below, when the Switch is selected, absorbing is true, and the button event will be absorbed and cannot be clicked.
